sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send a single snapshot using the notification from the field "Email Notification Single" in the Photobooth Instance record.
Send the main snapshot using the notification from the field "Email Notification Main" in the Photobooth Instance record.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send the main snapshot using the notification from the field "Email Notification Main" in the Photobooth Instance record.
Send a single snapshot using the notification from the field "Email Notification Single" in the Photobooth Instance record.
